Paloh Respons Jokowi: Humor, Bukan Peringatan Bagi Nasdem
06 Nov 2019, 23:24 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ketua Umum Partai NasDem Surya Paloh. (CNN Indonesia/Adhi Wicaksono)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Ketua Umum DPP Partai Nasdem Surya Paloh merespons 'sindiran' Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) yang menyebut dirinya lebih cerah usai bertemu Presiden PKS Sohibul Iman.Menurut Paloh, sindiran itu hanya sekadar humor tingkat tinggi yang biasa dilontarkan Jokowi kepada siapapun yang dikenalnya. "Sense of humor yang tinggi. Ya kita tetap gembira lah, menerima apa ya, respons secara humoris yang begitu luar biasa dari Pak Jokowi ya," kata Paloh saat ditemui usai HUT Golkar di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu (8/11).Lebih lanjut, Paloh mengatakan sindiran itu bukan merupakan sinyal peringatan dari Jokowi terhadap Nasdem agar tak jauh melakukan manuver politik. Ia meminta agar praduga ataupun pikiran negatif itu untuk segera dibuang jauh-jauh."Tidak, saya tak merasa itu [peringatan]. Kalau itu dianggap suatu warning ya saya pikir terlalu naif kita. Sayanglah, kemajuan berdemokrasi begitu jauh sudah kita miliki ya kan," kata Paloh.Selain itu, Paloh menegaskan hubungan dan komunikasi antarpartai koalisi Jokowi masih berjalan baik. Ia pun tak ingin membeda-bedakan parpol yang ada di dalam koalisi maupun yang berada di luar koalisi."Semua punya cita-cita besar bagaimana menjalankan posisi dan peran institusi parpol ini untuk meringankan beban masyarakat bukan memberatkan sebaliknya," kata dia.Paloh mengatakan belum bertemu secara langsung dengan Jokowi usai pertemuan bersama PKS. Meski begitu, ia bilang selalu rutin berkomunikasi dengan Jokowi. "Belum ketemu dalam fisik tetapi selalu ketemu dalam batin," kata dia.Sebelumnya Jokowi menyebut Paloh tampak lebih cerah dari biasanya setelah bertemu dengan Sohibul di Kantor DPP PKS, Jakarta.Jokowi menyinggung wajah Paloh cerah setelah berangkulan dengan Sohibul usai pertemuan. Mantan gubernur DKI Jakarta itu tak tahu makna dari rangkulan mereka berdua. Namun, Jokowi menyebut rangkulannya tak seperti biasa."Tidak pernah saya dirangkul oleh Bang Surya se-erat dengan Pak Sohibul Iman," ujar Jokowi. (rzr/fea)

Paloh Jokowi's Response: Humor, Not a Warning for Nasdem
Nov 6 2019, 23:24 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Chairperson of the NasDem Party Surya Paloh. (CNN Indonesia / Adhi Wicaksono)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - DPD Nasdem Party Chairperson Surya Paloh responds to President Joko Widodo's 'teasing' who calls himself brighter after meeting PKS President Sohibul Iman. According to Paloh, the satire is just a high-level humor that Jokowi usually throws at him anyone he knows. "The sense of humor is high. Yes, we are still happy, what are we receiving, the humorous response that is so extraordinary from Mr. Jokowi," Paloh said when met after the Golkar Anniversary at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (8/11). Furthermore, Paloh said the insinuation was not a warning signal from Jokowi against Nasdem not to go far in political maneuvering. He asked that the presumption or negative thoughts be immediately thrown away. "No, I do not feel that [warning]. If it is considered a warning yes I think we are too naive. Unfortunately, we have had too much democratic progress right? "Paloh said. In addition, Paloh emphasized that relations and communication between Jokowi's coalition parties were still going well. He also did not want to discriminate between political parties within the coalition and those outside the coalition. "All have big ideals on how to carry out the position and role of these political party institutions to ease the burden on society rather than burdening the opposite," he said. meet directly with Jokowi after the meeting with PKS. Even so, he said always routinely communicate with Jokowi. "Haven't met physically yet but always met inside," he said. Previously Jokowi said Paloh looked brighter than usual after meeting with Sohibul at the PKS DPP Office, Jakarta. Jokowi alluded to Paloh's bright face after embracing Sohibul after the meeting. The former Jakarta governor did not know the meaning of the two of them. However, Jokowi said his embrace was not as usual. "I have never been embraced by Bang Surya as closely as Mr. Sohibul Iman," Jokowi said. (rzr / fea)
